min_x.description: Minimun dimension of the domain in x direction

min_y.description: Minimun dimension of the domain in y direction

min_z.description: Minimun dimension of the domain in z direction

max_x.description: Maximun dimension of the domain in x direction

max_y.description: Maximun dimension of the domain in y direction

max_z.description: Maximun dimension of the domain in z direction

max_iter_p.description: Maximun iteration in the porosity calibration routine

max_iter_r.description: Maximun iteration in the resistivity calibration routine

max_iter_t.description: Maximun iteration in the thermal resistivity calibration routine

Ox_velocity_x.description: X component of the oxygen velocity at the boundary

Ox_velocity_y.description: Y component of the oxygen velocity at the boundary

Ox_velocity_z.description: Z component of the oxygen velocity at the boundary

Steam_velocity_x.description: X component of the steam velocity at the boundary

Steam_velocity_y.description: Y component of the steam velocity at the boundary

Steam_velocity_z.description: Z component of the steam velocity at the boundary

potential_difference.description: Electric potential difference in the simulation
